Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by California in 1983...
Injured on 6/15/1984 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/16/1988 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/13/1990...
Injured on 4/18/1991 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1993, going 6-1, 1.23...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1993, going 27-10, 3.09 ERA...
